Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache

Interface Record<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the type that can be retrieved from a cache
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseRecord, InvalidatableRecord, MergingRecord, ReplacingRecord, SimpleRecord
public interface Record<V>
A record stored in a cache of some kind. Represents one "unit of refreshability". Some caches have more than one Record, eg KeyValueCache maps Keys to Records.
